06/04/2025 - Office Visit 
Provider: Abdallah S Farrukh MD 
Location of Care: Antelope Valley Neuroscience Medi cal Group 
History of Present Illness: 
This is a well-known patient of mine she is suffers  from chronic neck pain, chronic low back pain perf orm 
an ACDF for the cervical spine that resulted in imp rovement in her myelopathy and radiculopathy but th e 
patient continued to have recurrent neck pain recur rent low back pain she does perform home exercise 
program but the patient says her neck pain in both shoulders as significant he progressed she has froz en 
shoulders both sides of the limitation of shoulder abduction flexion extension left worse than right.  Pap 
patient responded for a short by shoulder injection  and cervical spine injection in the past with bett er than 
70% improvement in her pain symptomatology and impr oved function 
I have given the patient shoulder exercises and cer vical spine exercises to do and ability bass bases 
addition to lumbar exercises 
Pain medication improve her pain experience by abou t 40-50% but the cervical spine facet injection wil l 
enhance her pain experience significantly and impro ve her activity daily living 
The patient does not report any ill effect from the  intake of her narcotics, nor the muscle relaxant 
methocarbamol
I have given the patient a Medrol Dosepak it did no t take away her neck pain or shoulder pain it happe ned 
on May 13 
When evaluated the patient she is fully awake alert  she has significant animation of pain in her face she 
cried when I asked her how she is doing so the neck  pain is quite severe is is rated to be 10/10 with 
severe limitation range of motion his neck is stiff  and she has radiation to the medial Area into the 
shoulder plus she has interestingly shoulder pain b ilateral
Patient reflexes are depressed in the bicipital tri ceps she has preservation of hand function dorsifle xion 
flaying flexion ulnar and median deviation of the w rist present there is full range of motion of both elbows 
but the shoulder she has hardly any abduction on th e right she did 5° in the left flexion was 5° on th e right 
5° of the left extension is about 10° of extenHowev er the pain is severe. 
For now the patient meets the4as of analgesia I wil l refill her narcotic a muscle relaxant but I am 
recommending cervical spine facet injection at C3-C 4 C4-C5 C5-C6 and injection of both shoulders I 
would like to perform a posterior subacromial injec tion in both shoulders at the same time 
Hands recommendation C3-C4, C4-C5, C5-C6 bilateral facet injections cervical spine 
Posterior subacromial shoulder injection bilaterall y using lidocaine and 10 mg adduct dexamethasone pe r 
shoulder 
Active Medications: 
Medrol (Pak) 4 mg tablets in a dose pack (methylpre dnisolone) Take 1 tablet by mouth as directed as 
directed following package instructions 
hydrocodone 10 mg-acetaminophen 325 mg tablet (hydr ocodone-acetaminophen) Take 1 tablet by mouth 
every twelve hours as needed for pain 
methocarbamol 750 mg tablet (methocarbamol) Take 1 tablet by mouth three times a day as needed for 
spasms 
Current Allergies: 
No known allergies

History of Present Illness: 
So isolated today her biggest issue is her shoulder  and neck pain she said the pain in the shoulder ne ck is 
disabling her by the facet injection lumbar spine i s at significant improvement in her pain experience  and 
lumbar spine and she actually says he hardly have a ny pain down the legs as well as of the injection b ack 
helped her back pain buttock pain and referred leg pain she did have true sciatica she is referred leg  pain 
but no true sciatica she also reports 50% improveme nt of her neck pain with the medication not helping  
the shoulder is much 
When evaluated she is fully awake alert oriented ×3  pupils are equal and reactive there is no limitati on of 
upward gaze no down beating nystagmus, extraocular muscle movement which is nerve III 4 6 is for face 
symmetric shoulder shrug on the left disc curtailed  due to the severe pain and swelling PFF 
The patient is able to have full range of motion th e right side left side she has loss of abduction fl exion 
extension she was almost 90% of these range of moti on specifically the abduction she has loss of 90% 
and flexion she did about 15° extension was 5° at b est Peno prepped 
Range of motion to the right she did 60° right late ral rotation 15° tilt to the right 5° tilt to the l eft left lateral 
rotation was 5° at best PFF 
Patient reports adequate pain experience with the i ntake medication without side effect she meets the4  a 
s of analgesia I will refill her medication.  Again  I am recommending facet injection at C3-C4 C4-5 C5 -6 
with a posterior subacromial injection of the left shoulder
